title: Cane Creek eeSILK+ boosts suspension seatpost, plus bolt-on HELM fender & more!
content:
Cane Creek has released a new longer travel suspension seatpost, the 35mm travel eeSILK+. Available in alloy and carbon models, the new Cane Creek eeSILK+ offers an additional 15mm of elastomer-damped suspension over the original eeSILK post. In other news, the brand has announced the addition of a bolt-on fender for HELM forks, the expansion

The post Cane Creek eeSILK+ boosts suspension seatpost, plus bolt-on HELM fender & more! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
